name: Firebind
tag_list: voip, video, port, tcp, udp, tcp-port, udp-port, port-scan, firewall, acl, port-block, path-scan, outbound, isp-block
overview:
Firebind builds deployable technology and tools to verify, qualify and classify network communication capabilities.

Firebind provides a novel way to verify whether your application or device will be able to successfully communicate to its server. Employing a proprietary patent-pending approach that is centered around the origin of data transmission such as a user, a customer or remote system. Products range from simple validation of protocol and port to complete classification of transmission statistics and applicability for VOIP, video and real-time communications protocols across a spectrum of service providers and application developers/operators.

Firebind technology is currently operating in production for customers in telepresence, online gaming and network communication segments. Additionally Firebind operates a public validation service at Firebind.com, for a growing variety of applications and protocols that utilize various combinations of ports and transport protocols to achieve application functionality. This public facility is in use 24/7 by a global audience to prove, diagnose and solve network communication issues.

external_links.title: Using Firebind To Test Network Ports
